text: aur unhen pavitr rahana chaahie, jo vivaah karane ka saamarthy nahin rakhate, yahaan tak ki unhen dhanee kar de allaah apane anugrah se tatha jo svaadheenata-lekh kee maang karen, tumhaare daas-daasiyon mein se, to tum unhen likh do, yadi tum unamen kuchh bhalaee jaano[1] aur unhen allaah ke us maal se do, jo usane tumhen pradaan kiya hai tatha baadhy na karo apanee daasiyon ko vyabhichaar par, jab ve pavitr rahana chaahatee hain,[2] taaki tum saansaarik jeevan ka laabh praapt karo aur jo unhen baadhy karega, to allaah unake baadhy kiye jaane ke pashchaat,[3] ati kshamee, dayaavaan hai
